workflow.name: Scrape Google Maps business leads with Apify & GPT-4 email extraction
workflow.description:
# üí• Automate Scrape Google Maps Business Leads (Email, Phone, Website) using Apify

![Workflow Overview](https://www.dr-firas.com/googlemaps.png)

# üß† AI-Powered Business Prospecting Workflow (Google Maps + Email Enrichment)

### Who is this for?
This workflow is designed for **entrepreneurs, sales teams, marketers, and agencies** who want to **automate lead discovery** and **build qualified business contact lists** ‚Äî without manual searching or copying data.  
It‚Äôs perfect for anyone seeking an **AI-driven prospecting assistant** that saves time, centralizes business data, and stays fully **compliant with GDPR**.

---

### What problem is this workflow solving?
Manually searching for potential clients, copying their details, and qualifying them takes hours ‚Äî and often leads to messy spreadsheets.  
This workflow **automates the process** by:
- Gathering **publicly available business information** from Google Maps  
- Enriching that data with **AI-powered summaries and contact insights**  
- Compiling it into a clean, ready-to-use **Google Sheet database**

This means you can focus on **closing deals**, not collecting data.

---

### What this workflow does
This automation identifies, analyzes, and organizes business opportunities in just a few steps:
1. **Telegram Trigger** ‚Üí Send a message specifying your business type, number of leads, and Google Maps URL.  
2. **Apify Integration** ‚Üí Fetches business information from Google Maps (public data).  
3. **Duplicate Removal** ‚Üí Ensures clean, non-redundant results.  
4. **AI Summarization (GPT-4)** ‚Üí Generates concise business summaries for better understanding.  
5. **Email Extraction (GPT-4)** ‚Üí Finds and extracts professional contact emails from company websites.  
6. **Google Sheets Integration** ‚Üí Automatically stores results (name, category, location, phone, email, etc.) in a structured sheet.  
7. **Telegram Notification** ‚Üí Confirms when all businesses are processed.  

All data is handled ethically and transparently ‚Äî only from **public sources** and without any unsolicited contact.

---

### Setup
1. **Telegram Setup**  
   - Create a Telegram bot via [BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather)  
   - Copy the API token and paste it into the Telegram Trigger node credentials.  

2. **Apify Setup**  
   - Create an account on [Apify](https://www.apify.com?fpr=udemy)  
   - Get your API token and connect it to the ‚ÄúRun Google Maps Scraper‚Äù node.  

3. **Google Sheets Setup**  
   - Connect your Google account under the ‚ÄúGoogle Maps Database‚Äù node.  
   - Specify the target spreadsheet and worksheet name.  

4. **OpenAI Setup**  
   - Add your OpenAI API key to the AI nodes (‚ÄúCompany Summary Info‚Äù and ‚ÄúExtract Business Email‚Äù).  

5. **Test**  
   - Send a Telegram message like:  
     `restaurants, 5, https://www.google.com/maps/search/restaurants+in+Paris`  

---

### How to customize this workflow to your needs
- **Change search region or business type** by modifying the Telegram input message format.  
- **Adjust the number of leads** via the `maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch` parameter in Apify.  
- **Add filters or enrichments** (e.g., websites with social links, review counts, or opening hours).  
- **Customize AI summaries** by tweaking the prompt inside the ‚ÄúCompany Summary Info‚Äù node.  
- **Integrate CRM tools** like HubSpot or Pipedrive by adding a connector after the Google Sheets node.  

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è Expected Outcome
‚úÖ A clean, enriched, and ready-to-use **Google Sheet** of businesses with:  
- Name, category, address, and city  
- Phone number and website  
- AI-generated business summary  
- Extracted professional email (if available)  

‚úÖ Telegram confirmation once all businesses are processed  

‚úÖ Fully automated, scalable, and GDPR-compliant prospecting workflow  

---

üí° *This workflow provides a transparent, ethical way to streamline your B2B lead research while staying compliant with privacy and anti-spam regulations.*


### üé• [Watch This Tutorial](https://youtu.be/cijBIHI6iLk)

![Apify logo](https://www.dr-firas.com/apify.png)

---
### üëã Need help or want to customize this?
üì© Contact: [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/)  
üì∫ YouTube: [@DRFIRASS](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  
üöÄ Workshops: [Mes Ateliers n8n](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Automate-Scrape-Google-Maps-Business-Leads-Email-Phone-Website-using-Apify-2a53d6550fd98118ba22e441171944dd?source=copy_link)
### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCriIQI8uaoEro5FEnOpeidQ) / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

workflow.name: üí• Automate Scrape Google Maps Business Leads (Email, Phone, Website) using Apify -vide II

parameters.customBody:
={
    "includeWebResults": false,
    "language": "fr",
    "locationQuery": "",
    "maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch": {{ $('Extract Input Data').item.json.limit }},
    "maxImages": 0,
    "maximumLeadsEnrichmentRecords": 0,
    "scrapeContacts": false,
    "scrapeDirectories": false,
    "scrapeImageAuthors": false,
    "scrapePlaceDetailPage": false,
    "scrapeReviewsPersonalData": true,
    "scrapeTableReservationProvider": false,
    "searchStringsArray": [
        "{{ $('Extract Input Data').item.json.sector }}"
    ],
    "skipClosedPlaces": false,
    "startUrls": [
        {
            "url": "{{ $('Extract Input Data').item.json.mapsUrl }}"
        }
    ]
}

value.title: ={{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.title }}
value.phoneUnformatted: ={{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.phonesUncertain || $('Loop Over Items').item.json.phoneUnformatted || 'No phone found' }}

nodes.name: Fetch Raw HTML Content from Business Website
Extract Business Email from Website HTML (GPT-4)

values.content:
=You are analyzing the HTML content of a business website to extract the most relevant contact email address.

Your task:

Extract only one email address, ideally belonging to the business owner, manager, or main contact person.

If multiple emails appear, choose the most authoritative or professional one (e.g., not ‚Äúinfo@‚Äù or ‚Äúsupport@‚Äù unless it‚Äôs the only option).

If no valid email is found, return exactly:
Null

Output rules:

Output only the email address (no explanation, no JSON, no punctuation, no quotes).

The result must be a clean, valid email format (e.g., contact@company.com).

Website HTML content:
{{ $json.data }}

parameters.content:
## Step 1 - Extract Input Data and  Run Google Maps Scraper

**Purpose:** Parses the Telegram message and extracts the three input parameters needed for the Google Maps scraper.

**Configuration:**
1. **Mode:** Run Once for All Items
2. **Language:** JavaScript
3. **Code Logic:**
   - Splits the message by semicolons (;)
   - Extracts three values: sector, limit, mapsUrl
   - Returns structured JSON output


**Purpose:** Executes the Apify Google Maps Scraper actor to collect business listings based on the provided search criteria.

**Configuration:**
1. **[API : Apify](https://www.apify.com?fpr=udemy)**
2. **Resource:** Actors
3. **Operation:** Run actor

## Step 2 - Google Maps Database and Extract Business Email

**Purpose:** Appends the processed business data (including AI-generated summary) to a Google Sheet for storage and analysis.

**Configuration:**
1. **Resource:** Sheet
2. **Operation:** Append
3. **Document ID:** 1STVdZYYKCE5Rt3YS4xKlEiZ85FZqTkqIn3ebm8xskYU
4. **Sheet Name:** Feuille 1
5. **Columns Mapping Mode:** Define Below

**Purpose:** Uses GPT-4o-mini to intelligently extract the business owner or primary contact email from the website HTML.

**Configuration:**
1. **Resource:** Text
2. **Operation:** Message
3. **Model:** GPT-4o-mini
4. **Simplify Output:** Enabled
5. **JSON Output:** Disabled (returns plain text email)

values.content:
=You are an AI assistant specialized in generating professional, concise, and natural company summaries from structured data scraped from Google Maps.

Your goal is to transform the provided company information into a fluent, human-like paragraph suitable for business directories or lead databases.

Follow these principles:

Maintain a professional and informative tone.

Write in one coherent paragraph (no lists or bullet points).

Smoothly omit any fields that are missing without mentioning it.

The final text must sound natural and ready for direct publication.

Output only the final summary paragraph ‚Äî no explanations, notes, or JSON.
Output the result in the JSON format companySummary

parameters.content:
## üîÑ Google Maps Business Scraper with Email Enrichment

@[youtube](cijBIHI6iLk)

## **Global Purpose:**
Automated lead generation system that scrapes business listings from Google Maps, generates AI-powered summaries, extracts contact emails from websites, and stores everything in Google Sheets.

**- [API : Apify](https://www.apify.com?fpr=udemy)** 
**- [Documentation : notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Automate-Scrape-Google-Maps-Business-Leads-Email-Phone-Website-using-Apify-2a53d6550fd98118ba22e441171944dd?source=copy_link)** 
**- [Google Sheets : copy](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1STVdZYYKCE5Rt3YS4xKlEiZ85FZqTkqIn3ebm8xskYU/copy)** 

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Extract Input Data and  Run Google Maps Scraper** 
   - Apify scrapes Google Maps for businesses
   - Dataset retrieved with all business details
   - Duplicates removed for data quality


2Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Maps Database and Extract Business Email** 
   - Each business processed individually:
     a) AI generates human-readable summary
     b) Business data + summary saved to Sheet 
     c) Website URL extracted 
     d) Website HTML fetched 
     e) AI extracts email from HTML 
     f) Email updated in Sheet 
     g) 2-second pause before next business 

## üì¨ Need Help or Want to Customize This?
**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)
